stack.description: Communication stack holding some useful tools for serial port and can communication as well as a package for communication between robots. The foreign_relay package is not originally from this stack http://ros.org/wiki/foreign_relay, it is here for commodity.
stack.author: Maintained by Gon√ßalo Cabrita goncabrita@isr.uc.pt and Pedro Sousa pvsousa@isr.uc.pt
